/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
